trans-unit.source: Brief history: The first version of the Web Audio spec only defined the factory methods. After a design review in October 2013, it was decided to add constructors because they have numerous benefits over factory methods. The constructors were added to the spec from August to October 2016. Factory methods continue to be included in the spec and are not deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 简要历史记录： Web Audio规范的第一个版本仅定义了工厂方法。在2013年10月进行设计审查后，决定添加构造函数，因为它们比工厂方法具有许多优点。从2016年8月到2016年10月，构造函数已添加到规范中。工厂方法继续包含在规范中，并且不建议弃用。

trans-unit.source: High precision timing is achieved by using the DOMHighResTimeStamp type for time values. The unit is milliseconds and should be accurate to 5 µs (microseconds). However, if the browser is unable to provide a time value accurate to 5 microseconds (because, for example, due to hardware or software constraints), the browser can represent a the value as a time in milliseconds accurate to a millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 DOMHighResTimeStamp 类型用于时间值，可以实现高精度计时。单位为毫秒，应精确到5 µs（微秒）。但是，如果浏览器无法提供精确到5微秒的时间值（例如，由于硬件或软件限制），则浏览器可以将值表示为精确到毫秒的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Note: An Audio element constructed with new Audio() won't be garbage collected as long as playback is in progress. It will continue playing and be audible until pause() is called or playback finishes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：只要播放正在进行，使用 new Audio() 构造的Audio元素就不会被垃圾回收。它会继续播放并且可以听见，直到调用 pause() 或播放结束为止。

trans-unit.source: Optional. The types of access that can be performed in the transaction. Transactions are opened in one of three modes: readonly, readwrite and readwriteflush (non-standard, Firefox-only.) versionchange mode can't be specified here. If you don't provide the parameter, the default access mode is readonly. To avoid slowing things down, don't open a readwrite transaction unless you actually need to write into the database.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。可以在事务中执行的访问类型。事务以以下三种模式之一打开： readonly ， readwrite 和 readwriteflush （非标准，仅Firefox。） versionchange 无法指定版本更改模式。如果不提供该参数，则默认访问模式为 readonly 。为避免速度变慢，除非您确实需要写入数据库，否则不要打开 readwrite 事务。

trans-unit.source: Pointer capture allows events for a particular pointer event (PointerEvent) to be re-targeted to a particular element instead of the normal target (or hit test) at a pointer's location. This can be used to ensure that an element continues to receive pointer events even if the pointer device's contact moves off the element (for example by scrolling).
trans-unit.target: 指针捕获允许将特定指针事件（ PointerEvent ）的事件重新定位到特定元素，而不是指针位置处的常规目标（或命中测试）。这可以用于确保即使指针设备的触点移离元素（例如，通过滚动），元素也继续接收指针事件。

trans-unit.source: The Fullscreen API defines two events which can be used to detect when full-screen mode is turned on and off, as well as when errors occur during the process of changing between full-screen and windowed modes. Event handlers for these events are available on the Document and Element interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 全屏API定义了两个事件，可用于检测何时打开和关闭全屏模式，以及在全屏和窗口模式之间进行切换的过程中何时发生错误。这些事件的事件处理程序在 Document 和 Element 接口上可用。

trans-unit.source: The Fullscreen API has no interfaces of its own. Instead, it augments several other interfaces to add the methods, properties, and event handlers needed to provide full-screen functionality. These are listed in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: WebGL by example is a series of live samples with short explanations that showcase WebGL concepts and capabilities. The examples are sorted according to topic and level of difficulty, covering the WebGL rendering context, shader programming, textures, geometry, user interaction, and more.
trans-unit.target: 通过示例，WebGL是一系列实时示例，其中简短说明了WebGL的概念和功能。根据主题和难易程度对示例进行了排序，涵盖了WebGL渲染上下文，着色器编程，纹理，几何图形，用户交互等。

trans-unit.source: A facial expression tracker (experimental): Researchers at the University of Southern California and Facebook’s Oculus division have been testing new ways of tracking facial expressions and transferring them to a virtual character.
trans-unit.target: 面部表情跟踪器（实验）：南加州大学和Facebook的Oculus部门的研究人员正在测试追踪面部表情并将其转换为虚拟角色的新方法。

trans-unit.source: A gamepad: We can configurate an XBox controller or similar to work as a keyboard in the browser — this offers further possibilities of interaction with a VR webpage. There are some gamepads that work with a mobile setup — like the MergeVR headset — but these are connected via Bluetooth so don't work with WebVR.
trans-unit.target: 游戏手柄：我们可以配置XBox控制器或类似的控件，使其在浏览器中充当键盘-这提供了与VR网页进行交互的更多可能性。有些游戏手柄可以与移动设备配合使用，例如MergeVR耳机，但它们通过蓝牙连接，因此不能与WebVR一起使用。

trans-unit.source: A hand recognition sensor: A sensor that tracks the position and movement of your hand, allowing it to become an interesting controller, and an object in VR gameworlds. The most advanced to date is the Leap Motion, which works with the computer (connected to the Oculus Rift) and can also work connected to a mobile device (the latter is in an experimental phase.)
trans-unit.target: 手势识别传感器：一种传感器，可跟踪您的手的位置和运动，使其成为有趣的控制器，并成为VR游戏世界中的对象。迄今为止，最先进的技术是Leap Motion，它可以与计算机（连接到Oculus Rift）一起使用，也可以与移动设备连接（后者处于实验阶段）。

trans-unit.source: A more complex positional sensor system: As an example, the HTC VIVE features two position sensors that sit in opposite corners of a space, mapping it all out and allowing VR experiences to be enjoyed in spaces of up to 5m x 5m.
trans-unit.target: 更加复杂的位置传感器系统：例如，HTC VIVE的两个位置传感器位于空间的相对角，将它们全部映射出来，并允许在最大5m x 5m的空间中享受VR体验。

trans-unit.source: AAGUID (16 bytes) - Authenticator Attestation Globally Unique Identifier, a unique number that identifies the model of the authenticator (not the specific instance of the authenticator) so that a relying party can understand the characteristics of the authenticator by looking up its metadata statement.
trans-unit.target: AAGUID（16字节）-身份验证者证明全局唯一标识符，一个唯一的数字，用于标识身份验证者的模型（不是身份验证者的特定实例），以便依赖方可以通过查找其元数据语句来了解身份验证者的特征。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility: As the browser controls the input elements of the payment sheet, it can assure consistent keyboard and screen reader accessibility on every website without developers needing to do anything. A browser could also adjust the font size or color contrast of the payment sheet, making it more comfortable for the user to make a payment.
trans-unit.target: 可访问性：由于浏览器控制着付款单的输入元素，因此可以确保每个网站上一致的键盘和屏幕阅读器可访问性，而开发人员无需执行任何操作。浏览器还可以调整付款表的字体大小或颜色对比度，使用户更方便地进行付款。

trans-unit.source: Always specify an exact target origin, not *, when you use postMessage to send data to other windows. A malicious site can change the location of the window without your knowledge, and therefore it can intercept the data sent using postMessage.
trans-unit.target: 使用 postMessage 将数据发送到其他窗口时，请始终指定确切的目标来源，而不是 * 。恶意站点可能在您不知情的情况下更改窗口的位置，因此它可以拦截使用 postMessage 发送的数据。

trans-unit.source: Ambient light is the light that permeates the scene; it's non-directional and affects every face in the scene equally, regardless of which direction it's facing.
trans-unit.target: 环境光是穿透场景的光。它是无方向性的，并且无论其面向哪个方向，均等地影响场景中的每个面孔。

trans-unit.source: An eye tracking sensor (experimental): The FOVE project is the first headset that reads subtle eye movements.
trans-unit.target: 眼动追踪传感器（实验性）：FOVE项目是第一个读取细微眼动的耳机。

trans-unit.source: Android Key Attestation - one of the features added in Android O was Android Key Attestation, which enables the Android operating system to attest to keys.
trans-unit.target: Android密钥证明 -Android O中添加的功能之一是Android密钥证明，它使Android操作系统能够证明密钥。

trans-unit.source: Android SafetyNet -prior to Android Key Attestation, the only option for Android devices was to create Android SafetyNet attestations
trans-unit.target: Android SafetyNet-在Android密钥证明之前，Android设备的唯一选择是创建Android SafetyNet证明

trans-unit.source: Application Requests Authentication - The application makes the initial authentication request. The protocol and format of this request is outside of the scope of WebAuthn.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序请求身份验证 -应用程序发出初始身份验证请求。此请求的协议和格式不在WebAuthn的范围内。

trans-unit.source: Application Requests Registration - The application makes the initial registration request. The protocol and format of this request is outside of the scope of WebAuthn.
trans-unit.target: 申请请求注册 -应用程序提出初始注册请求。此请求的协议和格式不在WebAuthn的范围内。

trans-unit.source: Attributes are GLSL variables which are only available to the vertex shader (as variables) and the JavaScript code. Attributes are typically used to store color information, texture coordinates, and any other data calculated or retrieved that needs to be shared between the JavaScript code and the vertex shader.
trans-unit.target: 属性是GLSL变量，仅可用于顶点着色器（作为变量）和JavaScript代码。属性通常用于存储颜色信息，纹理坐标以及所有需要在JavaScript代码和顶点着色器之间共享的计算或检索到的其他数据。

trans-unit.source: Authenticator Creates New Key Pair and Attestation - Before doing anything, the authenticator will typically ask for some form of user verification. This could be entering a PIN, using a fingerprint, doing an iris scan, etc. to prove that the user is present and consenting to the registration. After the user verification, the authenticator will create a new asymmetric key pair and safely store the private key for future reference. The public key will become part of the attestation, which the authenticator will sign over with a private key that was burned into the authenticator during its manufacturing process and that has a certificate chain that can be validated back to a root of trust.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证器创建新的密钥对和证明 -在进行任何操作之前，身份验证器通常会要求某种形式的用户验证。这可能是输入PIN，使用指纹，进行虹膜扫描等，以证明用户在场并同意注册。用户验证后，身份验证者将创建一个新的非对称密钥对，并安全地存储私钥以供将来参考。公钥将成为证明的一部分，身份验证者将使用在制造过程中烧入身份验证者的私钥进行签名，该私钥具有可以被验证回到信任根的证书链。

trans-unit.source: Authenticator Creates an Assertion - The authenticator finds a credential for this service that matches the Relying Party ID and prompts a user to consent to the authentication. Assuming both of those steps are successful, the authenticator will create a new assertion by signing over the clientDataHash and authenticatorData with the private key generated for this account during the registration call.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证器创建一个断言 -身份验证器找到与依赖方ID相匹配的此服务的凭据，并提示用户同意进行身份验证。假设这两个步骤均成功，那么身份验证器将使用在注册调用期间为此帐户生成的私钥对clientDataHash和authenticatorData进行签名，从而创建一个新的断言。

trans-unit.source: Authenticator Returns Data to Browser - The authenticator returns the authenticatorData and assertion signature back to the browser.
trans-unit.target: Authenticator将数据返回到浏览器 -Authenticator将authenticatorData和断言签名返回给浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Authenticator Returns Data to Browser - The new public key, a globally unique credential id, and other attestation data are returned to the browser where they become the attestationObject.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证器将数据返回到浏览器 -新的公钥，全局唯一的凭证ID和其他证明数据被返回到浏览器，在此它们成为证明对象。

trans-unit.source: Authenticator - the credentials are created and stored in a device called an authenticator. This is a new concept in authentication: when authenticating using passwords, the password is stored in a user's brain and no other device is needed; when authenticating using WebAuthn, the password is replaced with a key pair that is stored in an authenticator. The authenticator may be embedded into an operating system, such as Windows Hello, or may be a physical token, such as a USB or Bluetooth Security Key.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证器 -创建凭据并将其存储在称为身份验证器的设备中。这是身份验证中的一个新概念：使用密码进行身份验证时，密码存储在用户的大脑中，不需要其他设备。使用WebAuthn进行身份验证时，密码将替换为存储在身份验证器中的密钥对。身份验证器可以嵌入到操作系统（例如Windows Hello）中，也可以是物理令牌（例如USB或蓝牙安全密钥）。

trans-unit.source: Autonomous custom element: Standalone elements; they don't inherit from built-in HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 自主定制元素：独立元素；它们不继承自内置HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: Availability: ASTC compression is typically available on Mali ARM GPUs, Intel GPUs, and Nividia Tegra chips.
trans-unit.target: 可用性： ASTIC压缩通常在Mali ARM GPU，Intel GPU和Nividia Tegra芯片上可用。

trans-unit.source: Availability: ATC compression is typically available on mobile devices with Adreno GPUs, that are currently only built into Qualcomm Snapdragon devices.
trans-unit.target: 可用性： ATC压缩通常可在带有Adreno GPU的移动设备上使用，目前仅内置在Qualcomm Snapdragon设备中。

trans-unit.source: Availability: PVRTC is typically only available on mobile devices with PowerVR chipsets. It is used in all generations of the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad and supported on certain Android devices that use a PowerVR GPU.
trans-unit.target: 可用性： PVRTC通常仅在具有PowerVR芯片组的移动设备上可用。它已在iPhone，iPod Touch和iPad的所有版本中使用，并且在某些使用PowerVR GPU的Android设备上受支持。

trans-unit.source: Avoid making changes to the DOM within your idle callback. By the time your callback is run, the current frame has already finished drawing, and all layout updates and computations have been completed. If you make changes that affect layout, you may force a situation in which the browser has to stop and do recalculations that would otherwise be unnecessary. If your callback needs to change the DOM, it should use Window.requestAnimationFrame() to schedule that.
trans-unit.target: 避免在空闲回调中对DOM进行更改。在运行回调时，当前框架已经完成绘制，并且所有布局更新和计算都已完成。如果进行了影响布局的更改，则可能会导致浏览器不得不停止并进行重新计算的情况，否则这是不必要的。如果您的回调需要更改DOM，则应使用 Window.requestAnimationFrame() 进行安排。

trans-unit.source: Avoid tasks whose run time can't be predicted. Your idle callback should avoid doing anything that could take an unpredictable amount of time. For example, anything which might affect layout should be avoided. You should also avoid resolving or rejecting Promises, since that would invoke the handler for that promise's resolution or rejection as soon as your callback returns.
trans-unit.target: 避免运行时间无法预测的任务。空闲的回调应该避免做任何可能花费不可预测时间的事情。例如，应避免任何可能影响布局的事情。您还应该避免解析或拒绝 Promise ，因为这将在回调返回后立即调用处理程序以实现该Promise的解决或拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Base64 is a group of similar binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format by translating it into a radix-64 representation. The term Base64 originates from a specific MIME content transfer encoding.
trans-unit.target: Base64是一组类似的二进制到文本编码方案，它们通过将ASCII格式的二进制数据转换为基数64表示形式来表示二进制数据。术语Base64源自特定的MIME内容传输编码。

trans-unit.source: Browser Calls authenticatorGetCredential() on Authenticator - Internally, the browser will validate the parameters and fill in any defaults, which become the AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON. One of the most important parameters is the origin, which recorded as part of the clientData so that the origin can be verified by the server later. The parameters to the get() call are passed to the authenticator, along with a SHA-256 hash of the clientDataJSON (only a hash is sent because the link to the authenticator may be a low-bandwidth NFC or Bluetooth link and the authenticator is just going to sign over the hash to ensure that it isn't tampered with).
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在Authenticator上调用authenticatorGetCredential（） -内部，浏览器将验证参数并填写所有默认值，这些默认值将成为 AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON 。最重要的参数之一是原点，它被记录为clientData的一部分，以便稍后可以由服务器验证原点。 get（）调用的参数与clientDataJSON的SHA-256哈希一起传递给身份验证器（仅发送哈希，因为到身份验证器的链接可能是低带宽NFC或蓝牙链接，并且身份验证器是只需在哈希上签名以确保它不会被篡改）。

trans-unit.source: Browser Calls authenticatorMakeCredential() on Authenticator - Internally, the browser will validate the parameters and fill in any defaults, which become the AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON. One of the most important parameters is the origin, which is recorded as part of the clientData so that the origin can be verified by the server later. The parameters to the create() call are passed to the authenticator, along with a SHA-256 hash of the clientDataJSON (only a hash is sent because the link to the authenticator may be a low-bandwidth NFC or Bluetooth link and the authenticator is just going to sign over the hash to ensure that it isn't tampered with).
trans-unit.target: 浏览器在Authenticator上调用authenticatorMakeCredential（） -内部，浏览器将验证参数并填写所有默认值，这些默认值将成为 AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON 。最重要的参数之一是原点，它被记录为clientData的一部分，以便稍后可以由服务器验证原点。 create（）调用的参数与clientDataJSON的SHA-256哈希一起传递给身份验证器（仅发送哈希，因为到身份验证器的链接可能是低带宽NFC或蓝牙链接，并且身份验证器是只需在哈希上签名以确保它不会被篡改）。

trans-unit.source: Browser Creates Final Data, Application sends response to Server - The browser resolves the Promise to a PublicKeyCredential with a PublicKeyCredential.response that contains the AuthenticatorAssertionResponse. It is up to the JavaScript application to transmit this data back to the server using any protocol and format of its choice.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器创建最终数据，应用程序将响应发送到服务器 -浏览器使用包含 AuthenticatorAssertionResponse 的 PublicKeyCredential.response 将Promise解析为 PublicKeyCredential 。 JavaScript应用程序可以使用其选择的任何协议和格式将数据传输回服务器。

trans-unit.source: Browser Creates Final Data, Application sends response to Server - The create() Promise resolves to an PublicKeyCredential, which has a PublicKeyCredential.rawId that is the globally unique credential id along with a response that is the AuthenticatorAttestationResponse containing the AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON and AuthenticatorAttestationResponse.attestationObject. The PublicKeyCredential is sent back to the server using any desired formatting and protocol (note that the ArrayBuffer properties need to be be base64 encoded or similar).
trans-unit.target: 浏览器创建最终数据，应用程序将响应发送到服务器 PublicKeyCredential （）承诺解析为PublicKeyCredential，该 PublicKeyCredential.rawId 具有PublicKeyCredential.rawId（这是全局唯一的凭据ID）以及响应，该响应是 AuthenticatorAttestationResponse ,其中包含 AuthenticatorResponse.clientDataJSON 和 AuthenticatorAttestationResponse.attestationObject 。使用任何所需的格式和协议将 PublicKeyCredential 发送回服务器（请注意，ArrayBuffer属性需要使用base64编码或类似的格式）。

trans-unit.source: Consistent error handling: The browser can check the validity of card numbers, and can tell the user if a card has expired (or is about to expire). The browser can automatically suggest which card to use based on past usage patterns or restrictions from the merchant (e.g, "we only accept Visa or Mastercard"), or allow the user to say which is their default/favorite card.
trans-unit.target: 一致的错误处理：浏览器可以检查卡号的有效性，并可以告知用户卡是否已过期（或即将过期）。浏览器可以根据过去的使用模式或商人的限制自动建议要使用哪个卡（例如，“我们只接受Visa或Mastercard”），或允许用户说出哪个是他们的默认/收藏卡。

trans-unit.source: Consistent experience on every site (that supports the API): As the payment sheet is controlled by the browser, it can tailor the experience to the user. This can include localizing the UI into the user's preferred language.
trans-unit.target: 每个站点（支持API）上的一致体验：由于付款表是由浏览器控制的，因此它可以为用户定制体验。这可以包括将UI本地化为用户的首选语言。

trans-unit.source: Credentials management: Users can manage their credit cards and shipping addresses directly in the browser. A browser can also sync these "credentials" across devices, making it easy for users to jump from desktop to mobile and back again when buying things.

trans-unit.source: Idle callbacks should do their best not to overrun the time allotted. While the browser, your code, and the Web in general will continue to run normally if you go over the specified time limit (even if you goway over it), the time restriction is intended to ensure that you leave the system enough time to finish the current pass through the event loop and get on to the next one without causing other code to stutter or animation effects to lag. Currently, timeRemaining() has an upper limit of 50 milliseconds, but in reality you will often have less time than that, since the event loop may already be eating into that time on complex sites, with browser extensions needing processor time, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 空闲的回调应尽最大努力不超过分配的时间。虽然浏览器，你的代码，和一般的网络将继续，如果你去了指定的时间限制（即使你到正常运行方式在它），时间限制是为了确保你离开系统足够的时间来完成当前通过事件循环的操作并继续进行下一个操作，而不会导致其他代码结结或动画效果滞后。当前， timeRemaining() 的上限为50毫秒，但实际上，您的时间通常少于该时间，因为事件循环可能已经在复杂站点上占用了该时间，而浏览器扩展需要处理器时间，依此类推。 。

trans-unit.source: Important: The version number is an unsigned long long number, which means that it can be a very big integer. It also means that you can't use a float, otherwise it will be converted to the closest lower integer and the transaction may not start, nor the upgradeneeded event trigger. So for example, don't use 2.4 as a version number:

trans-unit.source: Important: These matrix functions are written for clarity of explanation, not for speed or memory management. These functions create a lot of new arrays, which can be particularly expensive for real time operations due to garbage collection. In real production code it would be best to use optimized functions. glMatrix is an example of a library that has a large focus on speed and performance. The focus in the glMatrix library is to have target arrays that are allocated before the update loop.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：编写这些矩阵函数是为了便于说明，而不是为了提高速度或内存管理。这些函数创建了许多新的数组，由于进行垃圾回收，这些数组对于实时操作可能特别昂贵。在实际的生产代码中，最好使用优化的功能。glMatrix是一个库的示例，该库非常注重速度和性能。glMatrix库中的焦点是在更新循环之前分配目标数组。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB databases store key-value pairs. The values can be complex structured objects, and keys can be properties of those objects. You can create indexes that use any property of the objects for quick searching, as well as sorted enumeration. Keys can be binary objects.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB数据库存储键值对。这些值可以是复杂的结构化对象，而键可以是那些对象的属性。您可以创建使用对象的任何属性进行快速搜索以及排序枚举的索引。键可以是二进制对象。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB does not use Structured Query Language (SQL). It uses queries on an index that produces a cursor, which you use to iterate across the result set. If you are not familiar with NoSQL systems, read the Wikipedia article on NoSQL.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB不使用结构化查询语言（SQL）。它使用对产生游标的索引的查询，您可以使用该游标在结果集中进行迭代。如果您不熟悉NoSQL系统，请阅读Wikipedia上有关NoSQL的文章。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB is built on a transactional database model. Everything you do in IndexedDB always happens in the context of a transaction. The IndexedDB API provides lots of objects that represent indexes, tables, cursors, and so on, but each of these is tied to a particular transaction. Thus, you cannot execute commands or open cursors outside of a transaction. Transactions have a well-defined lifetime, so attempting to use a transaction after it has completed throws exceptions. Also, transactions auto-commit and cannot be committed manually.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB建立在事务数据库模型上。您在IndexedDB中所做的一切始终在事务上下文中发生。IndexedDB API提供了许多表示索引，表，游标等的对象，但每个对象都与特定的事务绑定。因此，您无法在事务外部执行命令或打开游标。事务具有明确定义的生存期，因此在事务完成后尝试使用它会引发异常。同样，事务会自动提交，无法手动提交。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB is object-oriented. IndexedDB is not a relational database with tables representing collections of rows and columns. This important and fundamental difference affects the way you design and build your applications.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB是面向对象的。IndexedDB不是具有表表示行和列的集合的关系数据库。这种重要和根本的差异会影响您设计和构建应用程序的方式。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB uses DOM events to notify you when results are available. DOM events always have a type property (in IndexedDB, it is most commonly set to "success" or "error"). DOM events also have a target property that indicates where the event is headed. In most cases, the target of an event is the IDBRequest object that was generated as a result of doing some database operation. Success events don't bubble up and they can't be canceled. Error events, on the other hand, do bubble, and can be cancelled. This is quite important, as error events abort whatever transactions they're running in, unless they are cancelled.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB使用DOM事件在结果可用时通知您。 DOM事件始终具有 type 属性（在IndexedDB中，通常将其设置为 "success" 或 "error" ）。 DOM事件还具有 target 属性，该属性指示事件的去向。在大多数情况下，事件的 target 是 IDBRequest 对象，该对象是由于执行某些数据库操作而生成的。成功事件不会冒泡，也无法取消。另一方面，错误事件会冒泡，可以取消。这非常重要，因为错误事件将中止它们正在运行的任何事务，除非它们被取消。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB uses a lot of requests. Requests are objects that receive the success or failure DOM events that were mentioned previously. They have onsuccess and onerror properties, and you can call addEventListener() and removeEventListener() on them. They also have readyState, result, and errorCode properties that tell you the status of the request. The result property is particularly magical, as it can be many different things, depending on how the request was generated (for example, an IDBCursor instance, or the key for a value that you just inserted into the database).
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB使用大量请求。请求是接收前面提到的成功或失败DOM事件的对象。它们具有 onsuccess 和 onerror 属性，您可以在它们上调用 addEventListener() 和 removeEventListener() 。它们还具有 readyState ， result 和 errorCode 属性，它们可以告诉您请求的状态。的 result 特性尤其神奇，因为它可以是许多不同的事情，这取决于如何生成该请求（例如，一个 IDBCursor 实例或您刚刚插入到数据库中的值的键）。

trans-unit.source: IndexedDB is a way for you to persistently store data inside a user's browser. Because it lets you create web applications with rich query abilities regardless of network availability, these applications can work both online and offline. IndexedDB is useful for applications that store a large amount of data (for example, a catalog of DVDs in a lending library) and applications that don't need persistent internet connectivity to work (for example, mail clients, to-do lists, and notepads).
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB是一种将数据持久存储在用户浏览器中的方法。因为它使您可以创建具有丰富查询功能的Web应用程序，而不管网络是否可用，所以这些应用程序可以联机和脱机运行。IndexedDB对于存储大量数据的应用程序（例如，借阅库中的DVD目录）和不需要持久的Internet连接即可工作的应用程序（例如，邮件客户端，任务列表和记事本）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Some controlling user agents may allow the user to initiate a default presentation connection and select a presentation display with the same user gesture. For example, the browser chrome could allow the user to pick a display from a menu, or allow the user to tap on an Near Field Communications (NFC) enabled display. In this case, when the controlling user agent asks for permission while starting a presentation, the browser could offer that display as the default choice, or consider the gesture as granting permission for the display and bypass display selection entirely.
trans-unit.target: 注意：一些控制用户代理可能允许用户启动默认演示文稿连接并选择具有相同用户手势的演示文稿显示。例如，浏览器镶边可以允许用户从菜单中选择显示，或者允许用户点击启用了近场通信（NFC）的显示。在这种情况下，当控制用户代理在开始演示时请求许可时，浏览器可以将该显示提供为默认选择，或将手势视为授予该显示许可，并完全绕开显示选择。

trans-unit.source: Note: Based on the current implementation, browsers won't actually read the bytestream of a file to determine its media type. It is assumed based on the file extension; a PNG image file renamed to .txt would give "text/plain" and not "image/png". Moreover, file.type is generally reliable only for common file types like images, HTML documents, audio and video. Uncommon file extensions would return an empty string. Client configuration (for instance, the Windows Registry) may result in unexpected values even for common types. Developers are advised not to rely on this property as a sole validation scheme.
trans-unit.target: 注意：根据当前的实现，浏览器实际上不会读取文件的字节流来确定其媒体类型。假定基于文件扩展名；一个重命名为.txt的PNG图片文件将显示“ text / plain ”而不是“ image / png ”。此外， file.type 通常仅对常见文件类型（例如图像，HTML文档，音频和视频）可靠。不常见的文件扩展名将返回一个空字符串。客户端配置（例如，Windows注册表）可能会导致意外值，即使对于常见类型也是如此。建议开发人员不要将此属性作为唯一的验证方案。

trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，如果未正确使用path， clearRect() 可能会导致意外的副作用。确保在调用 beginPath() 之后开始绘制新项目之前先调用 clearRect() 。

trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，如果画布包含不使用CORS 而从其他来源获得的任何像素，则该画布将被污染，并且其内容将无法再读取和保存。见保安和被污染的画布中允许跨域使用图像和帆布

trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that in our vertical line example, the Y position still referenced an integer gridline position—if it hadn't, we would see pixels with half coverage at the endpoints (but note also that this behavior depends on the current lineCap style whose default value is butt; you may want to compute consistent strokes with half-pixel coordinates for odd-width lines, by setting the lineCap style to square, so that the outer border of the stroke around the endpoint will be automatically extended to cover the whole pixel exactly).
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，在我们的垂直线示例中，Y位置仍然引用了整数网格线位置-如果没有，则在端点处我们会看到像素覆盖了一半（但还要注意，此行为取决于当前的 lineCap 样式）的默认值是 butt ；通过将 lineCap 样式设置为 square ，您可能想通过半像素坐标为奇数宽度的线计算一致的笔触，以便围绕端点的笔触的外边界将自动扩展为覆盖整个像素）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that the slice() method has vendor prefixes on some browsers and versions: blob.mozSlice() for Firefox 12 and earlier and blob.webkitSlice() in Safari. An old version of the slice() method, without vendor prefixes, had different semantics, and is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 注：请注意， slice() 方法对某些浏览器和版本供应商前缀： blob.mozSlice() 用于Firefox 12和更早版本和 blob.webkitSlice() 在Safari。没有供应商前缀的 slice() 方法的旧版本具有不同的语义，并且已过时。

trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that the slice() method has vendor prefixes on some browsers and versions: blob.mozSlice() for Firefox 12 and earlier and blob.webkitSlice() in Safari. An old version of the slice() method, without vendor prefixes, had different semantics, and is obsolete. The support for blob.mozSlice() has been dropped with Firefox 30.
trans-unit.target: 注：请注意， slice() 方法对某些浏览器和版本供应商前缀： blob.mozSlice() 用于Firefox 12和更早版本和 blob.webkitSlice() 在Safari。没有供应商前缀的 slice() 方法的旧版本具有不同的语义，并且已过时。Firefox 30已 blob.mozSlice() 支持blob.mozSlice（）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that you may get unexpected results when using a relatively large radius: the arc's connecting line will go in whatever direction it must to meet the specified radius.

trans-unit.source: Note: Because the contents of an HTMLCollection are live, changes to the underlying DOM can and will cause the position of individual nodes in the collection to change, so the index value will not necessarily remain constant for a given node.
trans-unit.target: 注意：因为 HTMLCollection 的内容是活动的，所以对基础DOM的更改可能并且将导致集合中各个节点的位置发生更改，因此索引值对于给定的节点不一定保持恒定。

trans-unit.source: Note: Because the result returned bycompareDocumentPosition is a bitmask, the bitwise and operator has to be used for meaningful results.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 compareDocumentPosition 返回的结果是位掩码，因此必须使用按位和运算符来获得有意义的结果。

trans-unit.source: Note: Before version 37, Chrome doesn't let you call Notification.requestPermission() in the load event handler (see issue 274284).
trans-unit.target: 注意：在版本37之前，Chrome浏览器不允许您在 load 事件处理程序中调用 Notification.requestPermission() （请参阅问题274284）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Browser support for the asynchronous clipboard APIs is still in the process of being implemented. Be sure to check the compatibility table as well as Clipboard availability in Clipboard for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：浏览器对异步剪贴板API的支持仍在实施中。一定要检查兼容性表，以及剪贴板的可用性在剪贴板中获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: By default, getCurrentPosition() tries to answer as fast as possible with a low accuracy result. It is useful if you need a quick answer regardless of the accuracy. Devices with a GPS, for example, can take a minute or more to get a GPS fix, so less accurate data (IP location or wifi) may be returned to getCurrentPosition().
trans-unit.target: 注意：默认情况下， getCurrentPosition() 尝试以较低的准确性结果尽可能快地回答。如果您需要快速解答而不考虑准确性，这将很有用。例如，具有GPS的设备可能需要一分钟或更长时间才能获得GPS定位，因此精度较低的数据（IP位置或wifi）可能会返回给 getCurrentPosition() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: CORS support for Canvas 2D drawImage is implemented in Gecko 9.0. This means that using a cross-domain image with CORS approval does no longer taint the 2D canvas, so the 2D canvas remains usable as the source of a WebGL texture.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Gecko 9.0中实现了对Canvas 2D drawImage 的 CORS支持。这意味着使用具有CORS批准的跨域图像不会再污染2D画布，因此2D画布仍可用作WebGL纹理的来源。

trans-unit.source: Note: CORS support for WebGL textures and the crossOrigin attribute for image elements is implemented in Gecko 8.0.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Gecko 8.0中实现了对WebGL纹理和图像元素的 crossOrigin 属性的CORS支持。

trans-unit.source: Note: CORS support for cross-domain videos and the crossorigin attribute for <video> elements is implemented in Gecko 12.0.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Gecko 12.0中实现了对跨域视频的CORS支持和 <video> 元素的 crossorigin 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Calling this method for an already active request (one for which open() has already been called) is the equivalent of calling abort().
trans-unit.target: 注意：为一个已经处于活动状态的请求（已针对其调用 open() )调用此方法等效于调用 abort() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Different browsers support ICE restart under different sets of conditions. Not all browsers will perform ICE restart due to network congestion, for example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不同的浏览器在不同的条件下支持ICE重新启动。例如，由于网络拥堵，并非所有浏览器都会执行ICE重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Note: Do not confuse this property with the MouseEvent.button property. The MouseEvent.buttons property indicates the state of buttons pressed during any kind of mouse event, while the MouseEvent.button property only guarantees the correct value for mouse events caused by pressing or releasing one or multiple buttons.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不要将此属性与 MouseEvent.button 属性混淆。所述 MouseEvent.buttons 属性指示任何类型的鼠标事件的期间按下按钮的状态，而 MouseEvent.button 属性只保证所引起的按压或释放一个或多个按钮的鼠标事件的正确的值。

trans-unit.target: 注意：即使我们的连接两端都在同一页上，我们也将把开始连接的一端称为“本地”端，将另一端称为“远程”端。

trans-unit.source: Note: Every RTCRtpSender is paired with an RTCRtpReceiver to make up an RTCRtpTransceiver. The associated receiver is muted (indicating that it is not able to deliver packets) until and unless one or more streams are added to the receiver by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：每个 RTCRtpSender 都与一个 RTCRtpReceiver 配对以组成一个 RTCRtpTransceiver 。除非并且除非远程对等方将一个或多个流添加到接收器，否则关联的接收器将被静音（指示它无法传递数据包）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Firefox 3 alters the security for windows' documents so that only the domain from which it was located can access the document. While this may break some existing sites, it's a move made by both Firefox 3 and Internet Explorer 7, and results in improved security.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Firefox 3更改了Windows文档的安全性，因此只有其所在的域才能访问该文档。尽管这可能会破坏某些现有站点，但Firefox 3和Internet Explorer 7都采取了此举，并提高了安全性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Firefox does not implement the dialogHide, edge, status, or unadorned arguments.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Firefox不实现 dialogHide ， edge ， status 或 unadorned 参数。

trans-unit.source: Note: First statement uses NodeList method item(0), which is equivalent to getElementsByTagName('head')[0].
trans-unit.target: 注意：第一条语句使用NodeList方法 item(0) ，它等效于 getElementsByTagName('head')[0].

trans-unit.source: Note: Focus (which element is receiving user input events) is not the same thing as selection (the currently highlighted part of the document). You can get the current selection using window.getSelection().
trans-unit.target: 注意：焦点（哪个元素正在接收用户输入事件）与选择（文档的当前突出显示部分）不同。您可以使用 window.getSelection() 获得当前选择。

trans-unit.source: Note: For event listeners attached to the event target, the event is in the target phase, rather than the capturing and bubbling phases. Events in the target phase will trigger all listeners on an element in the order they were registered, regardless of the useCapture parameter.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于附加到事件目标的事件侦听器，事件处于目标阶段，而不是捕获和冒泡阶段。目标阶段中的事件将按照元素注册的顺序触发元素上的所有侦听器，而不管 useCapture 参数如何。

trans-unit.source: Note: For multipart requests, this returns the headers from the current part of the request, not from the original channel.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于多部分请求，这将从请求的当前部分而不是原始通道返回标头。

trans-unit.source: Note: For security reasons, when a web page tries to access location information, the user is notified and asked to grant permission. Be aware that each browser has its own policies and methods for requesting this permission.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于安全原因，当网页尝试访问位置信息时，会通知用户并要求其授予权限。请注意，每个浏览器都有自己的策略和方法来请求此权限。

trans-unit.source: Note: For your custom fields, you may encounter a "not allowed by Access-Control-Allow-Headers in preflight response" exception when you send requests across domains. In this situation, you need to set up the Access-Control-Allow-Headers in your response header at server side.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于您的自定义字段，跨域发送请求时，可能会遇到“ 飞行前响应中Access-Control-Allow-Headers不允许的 ”异常。在这种情况下，您需要在服务器端的响应头中设置 Access-Control-Allow-Headers 。

trans-unit.source: Note: From Gecko 9 until Gecko 51, the groupCollapsed() method was the same as group(). Collapsed groups are fully supported starting in Gecko 52. See bug 1088360.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Gecko 9到Gecko 51， groupCollapsed() 方法与 group() 相同。从Gecko 52开始，完全支持折叠的组。请参见bug 1088360。

trans-unit.source: Note: Fullscreen requests need to be called from within an event handler or otherwise they will be denied.
trans-unit.target: 注意：需要在事件处理程序中调用全屏请求，否则将被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Note: Gecko's implementation of the send() method differs somewhat from the specification in Gecko 6.0; Gecko returns a boolean indicating whether or not the connection is still open (and, by extension, that the data was successfully queued or transmitted); this is corrected in Gecko 8.0.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Gecko的 send() 方法的实现与Gecko 6.0中的规范有所不同。Gecko返回一个 boolean 指示连接是否仍处于打开状态（并扩展了数据是否已成功排队或传输）；这在Gecko 8.0中已得到纠正。

trans-unit.source: Note: Gradient coordinates are global, i.e., relative to the current coordinate space. When applied to a shape, the coordinates are NOT relative to the shape's coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 注意：梯度坐标是全局的，即相对于当前坐标空间。当应用于形状时，坐标不相对于形状的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Note: If port is null — and port is supported by the user agent — passing the candidate to addIceCandidate() will fail, throwing an OperationError exception.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 port 为 null （并且用户代理支持 port addIceCandidate() 则将候选对象传递给addIceCandidate（）将会失败，并引发 OperationError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Note: If SharedWorker can be accessed from several browsing contexts, all those browsing contexts must share the exact same origin (same protocol, host and port).
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果可以从多个浏览上下文访问SharedWorker，则所有这些浏览上下文必须共享完全相同的来源（相同的协议，主机和端口）。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a controlling user agent does not support initiation of a presentation connection from the browser chrome, setting defaultRequest will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果控制用户代理不支持从浏览器镶边启动演示连接，则设置 defaultRequest 将无效。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果某行不包含冒号，则将整行视为具有空值字符串的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a scheduled stop time occurs before the node's scheduled start time, the node never starts to play.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果计划的停止时间早于节点的计划的开始时间，则该节点永远不会开始播放。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 Response 的 Response.type 为 "opaque" ，则生成的 Blob 的 Blob.size 为 0 ,而 Blob.type 为空字符串 "" ，这使其对 URL.createObjectURL 之类的方法无效。

trans-unit.source: Note: If the hardware doesn't know how to remove gravity from the acceleration data, this value may not be present in the DeviceMotionEvent. In this situation, you'll need to use DeviceMotionEvent.accelerationIncludingGravity instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果硬件不知道如何从加速度数据中消除重力，则 DeviceMotionEvent 中可能不存在该值。在这种情况下，您需要改用 DeviceMotionEvent.accelerationIncludingGravity 。

trans-unit.source: Note: If the key is used as a macro that inserts multiple characters, this attribute's value is the entire string, not just the first character.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果键用作插入多个字符的宏，则此属性的值是整个字符串，而不仅仅是第一个字符。
